title: Gather Your Allies
content: ttle. Halsin: Rescue Halsin in the Goblin Camp during Act 1, then cure the shadow curse in Act 2. Spirit of the Land Passive: +1 to all ability scores; +2 meters movement range. Florrick: Rescue Counsellor Florrick from the fire at Waukeen's Rest in Act 1 (leaving the area will cause her death) and save her from Wyrm's Rock Prison in Act 3. Florrick's Cohort: Summon 3 highly defensive melee fighters that utilize reach. Isobel: Make sure that Isobel stays alive throughout Act 2 and spare Nightson
